TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridLengthConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

Docs.summary: Converts instances of various types to and from instances of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.param: An object that provides a format context.
Docs.summary: Determines whether an instance of the specified type can be converted to an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"> class.
Docs.returns: `true` if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, `false`.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This converter can convert from the following types:
- <xref:System.String>
- <xref:System.Decimal>
- <xref:System.Single>
- <xref:System.Double>
- <xref:System.Int16>
- <xref:System.Int32>
- <xref:System.Int64>
- <xref:System.UInt16>
- <xref:System.UInt32>
- <xref:System.UInt64>
- <xref:System.Byte>
